feed.title: English Project - Free English Learning Lessons
feed.subtitle: Master English with 500+ free lessons! Interactive exercises, grammar guides, vocabulary builders & speaking practice. From beginner to advanced.

entry.title: Interactive Discourse Analysis - Advanced Level
entry.summary: Master advanced discourse analysis techniques with interactive exercises. Learn to analyze text structure, coherence, and persuasive language patterns.
entry.content: Master advanced discourse analysis techniques with interactive exercises. Learn to analyze text structure, coherence, and persuasive language patterns in academic and professional contexts.

entry.title: Interactive Academic Discourse - Advanced Level
entry.summary: Develop sophisticated academic writing and discourse skills with interactive practice sessions designed for advanced learners.
entry.content: Develop sophisticated academic writing and discourse skills with interactive practice sessions designed for advanced learners pursuing higher education or research.

entry.title: Advanced Writing Techniques for Professional Communication
entry.summary: Master sophisticated writing techniques including complex sentence structures, advanced vocabulary usage, and persuasive writing strategies.
entry.content: Master sophisticated writing techniques including complex sentence structures, advanced vocabulary usage, and persuasive writing strategies for professional and academic success.

entry.title: Interactive Business Meetings - Intermediate Level
entry.summary: Practice essential business meeting skills with interactive scenarios covering presentations, negotiations, and professional discussions.
entry.content: Practice essential business meeting skills with interactive scenarios covering presentations, negotiations, and professional discussions for intermediate-level learners.

entry.title: Interactive Conditionals Practice - Intermediate Level
entry.summary: Master all types of conditional sentences with interactive exercises and real-world examples for intermediate learners.
entry.content: Master all types of conditional sentences with interactive exercises and real-world examples. Perfect for intermediate learners looking to improve their grammar accuracy.

entry.title: Essential Business English Vocabulary
entry.summary: Build your professional vocabulary with essential business terms, phrases, and expressions used in corporate environments.
entry.content: Build your professional vocabulary with essential business terms, phrases, and expressions used in corporate environments. Perfect for career advancement.

entry.title: English Culture and Common Idioms
entry.summary: Explore English-speaking cultures and learn common idioms that will help you sound more natural and confident in conversations.
entry.content: Explore English-speaking cultures and learn common idioms that will help you sound more natural and confident in conversations with native speakers.

entry.title: Complete English Pronunciation Guide
entry.summary: Improve your English pronunciation with comprehensive guides covering phonetics, stress patterns, and common pronunciation challenges.
entry.content: Improve your English pronunciation with comprehensive guides covering phonetics, stress patterns, and common pronunciation challenges for non-native speakers.

entry.title: Listening Skills Development for Beginners
entry.summary: Develop essential listening skills with beginner-friendly exercises, audio content, and strategies for better comprehension.
entry.content: Develop essential listening skills with beginner-friendly exercises, audio content, and proven strategies for better English comprehension.

entry.title: Interactive Daily Routines - Beginner Level
entry.summary: Learn to describe daily activities and routines with interactive exercises perfect for beginner English learners.
entry.content: Learn to describe daily activities and routines with interactive exercises perfect for beginner English learners. Build practical vocabulary for everyday conversations.

entry.title: Daily Activities Vocabulary Builder
entry.summary: Expand your vocabulary with essential words and phrases for describing daily activities, routines, and everyday situations.
entry.content: Expand your vocabulary with essential words and phrases for describing daily activities, routines, and everyday situations that you encounter regularly.

entry.title: Master the Present Simple Tense
entry.summary: Learn the fundamentals of the present simple tense with clear explanations, examples, and interactive practice exercises.
entry.content: Learn the fundamentals of the present simple tense with clear explanations, examples, and interactive practice exercises. Essential for all English learners.
